inputs.name: InvoiceTotal

Compose_union_of_LineItems.inputs:
@json(
    replace(
        replace(
            concat(
                variables('LineItems'),
                body('Run_FixedFee_Child_Flow')?['lineitems'],
                body('Run_Per_Occupied_Room_Child_Flow')?['lineitems'],
                body('Run_Bell_Service_Fee_Child_Flow')?['lineitems'],
                body('Run_Deposited_Revenue_Child_Flow')?['lineitems'],
                body('Run_Insurance_and_Claims_Child_Flow')?['lineitems'],
                body('Run_Management_Fee_Child_Flow')?['lineitems'],
                body('Run_a_NonGL_Billable__Expense_Child_Flow')?['lineitems'],
                body('Run_Mid_Month_Advance_Child_Flow')?['lineitems'],
                body('Run_Per_Labor_Hour_Child_Flow')?['lineitems'],
                body('Filter_AdhocLineItems_array'),
                if(
                    equals(body('Run_a_Child_Flow_-_Revenue_Sharing')?['lineitems'], null),
                    json('[]'),
                    body('Run_a_Child_Flow_-_Revenue_Sharing')?['lineitems']
                ),
                if(
                    equals(body('Run_a_Child_Flow_-_Revenue_Share_Validations')?['lineitems'], null),
                    json('[]'),
                    body('Run_a_Child_Flow_-_Revenue_Share_Validations')?['lineitems']
                )
            ),
            '[]',  
            ''     
        ),
        '][',    
        ','
    )
)

parameters.$filter: bs_site eq '@{body('Parse_Contract_JSON')?['_bs_customersitefk_value@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']}' and bs_month eq '@{formatDateTime(body('Add_a_new_Statement_row')?['bs_serviceperiodstart'],'MM')}' and bs_year eq '@{formatDateTime(body('Add_a_new_Statement_row')?['bs_serviceperiodstart'],'yyyy')}'

_bs_customersitefk_value eq '@{body('Parse_Contract_JSON')?['_bs_customersitefk_value']}' and bs_billingstatementid ne '@{outputs('Add_a_new_Statement_row')?['body/bs_billingstatementid']}' and bs_serviceperiodstart eq @{outputs('Add_a_new_Statement_row')?['body/bs_serviceperiodstart']}
